questions.question: Do any columns in this Amazon reviews dataset have a substantial amount of missing data? Return as JSON with keys: count, columns.
questions.hint: Compute the percentage of missing values per column, identify those exceeding 5%, count them and list their names alphabetically.
questions.output_schema: A JSON object with exactly 2 keys: "count" (integer) and "columns" (list of column names, alphabetically sorted). Example: {"count": 3, "columns": ["col_a", "col_b", "col_c"]}

questions.question: Are there any columns in the dataset that have a high proportion of missing values? Return as JSON with keys: count, columns.
questions.hint: Compute the missing percentage for each column, then count and list columns where the missing rate exceeds 10%.
questions.output_schema: A JSON object with exactly 2 keys: "count" (integer) and "columns" (list of column names, alphabetically sorted). Example: {"count": 3, "columns": ["col_a", "col_b", "col_c"]}
